name: OzBall - Kickstarter Demo
description:
This demo is free to play.
Its is an early version of Table 1 and will look very different at final release.

For now just have some fun and see what score you can get.

The kickstarter is at: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/marcusfromoz/ozball-a-new-pinball-challenge... and will be running until July 20th.
